text:
Milky, we are a Paris based company specialized in the development of innovative web & mobile applications.

We're a small company (you'll be #8 in the tech team), we have a lot of cool customers (Canal+ for example)

We're looking for full stack developers.

Our technology stack: - Ruby on Rails - MongoDB - BackboneJS and AngularJS - Sass, CoffeeScript

Bonus points if you know how to deal with AWS, server administration, load testing, APIs (FB, Linkedin, TW, Salesforce...), dataviz stuff etc...

Say "Hi" to jobs@milky.fr if you're interested.
